workshop.title: Container Native Development
workshop.description: How to create a CI/CD pipeline and deploy to a managed Kubernetes environment using Wercker.

versions.name: Virtual Box
versions.description: Use the Oracle-provided VirtualBox Image running on your laptop

versions.name: Linux/Mac Local Install
versions.description: Setup you Linux own OS X laptop to run this workshop

versions.name: VNC Image
versions.description: Use an Oracle Provided Cloud Image to perform this Workshop.

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: Step-by-step workshop instructions

labs.title: Lab 100: Containerize Your Java Microservice
labs.description: Use Wercker to automatically build your application and package it as a Docker image

labs.title: Lab 200: Automate Deployment to Kubernetes
labs.description: Use Wercker to set up a managed Kubernetes cluster and deploy to it

labs.title: Lab 300: Make a Bug Fix to Your Java Microservice
labs.description: Go from code change to production using Wercker

labs.title: Lab 400: Kubernetes Blue/Green Deployments
labs.description: Stage your new version without disrupting the current deployment

labs.title: Lab 500: Extend Your Application with a Function
labs.description: Install Fn in Kubernetes and Deploy a Function

labs.title: Cloud Environment Post Workshop Cleanup
labs.description: Reset your cloud environment by removing the Cloud Instances, Networking, etc. created during the workshop
